articles.title: Kevin Durant, Rockets pummel exhausted Celtics to snap three-game winning streak: 6 takeaways
articles.description:
Boston ran out of steam playing their third game in four days on Saturday night.

The post Kevin Durant, Rockets pummel exhausted Celtics to snap three-game winning streak: 6 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics lost to Rockets 120-102 on November 2, ending their three-game winning streak.
Kevin Durant scored 30 points, exploiting the Celtics' fatigue from playing three games in four days.
Boston residents may see increased scrutiny on team stamina and scheduling as season progresses.

articles.title: Patriots elevate veteran RB D’Ernest Johnson ahead of Sunday’s game vs. Falcons
articles.description:
With Rhamondre Stevenson out on Sunday, New England added a reinforcement to its backfield.

The post Patriots elevate veteran RB D’Ernest Johnson ahead of Sunday’s game vs. Falcons appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots elevate RB D’Ernest Johnson from practice squad for Falcons game on November 5.
Rhamondre Stevenson will miss the game due to injury, impacting the team's running strategy.
Local fans can expect Johnson's experience to bolster the Patriots' backfield against Atlanta.
